query:
UPDATE team_members 
SET 
  bio = 'Ma. Engela Rose P. Espares serves as Director at 3B Solution in the Philippines, providing essential on-the-ground support for international investors and managing local market operations. She earned her Bachelor\'s Degree in Business Administration with a major in Marketing Management in 2019 from Academia de San Lorenzo Dema-Ala Inc., City of San Jose del Monte, Bulacan.

Engela began her professional career in 2018 with two years of corporate experience, including one year at Hyundai Quezon Avenue in Quezon City and one year at Prudential Guarantee Assurance Inc. in Greenhills, Mandaluyong City. Following the pandemic, she transitioned into real estate at the end of 2023, bringing her marketing and client relations expertise to the property sector.

At 3B Solution, Engela\'s primary responsibilities encompass managing marketing activities and brand visibility in the Philippines, including social media promotion and local engagement. She handles leasing and sales inquiries for both residential and commercial office spaces, and provides comprehensive property and market research to support business development for the company and its German partner, 3B Solution DE.

Engela\'s approach is solution-driven, tailoring strategies to each client\'s specific goals and investment plans. As the locally based team member, she provides hands-on support by guiding clients through each stage of the property process, ensuring they can make informed and confident decisions. She helps clients identify suitable locations by combining property and market research, site inspections, and rigorous due diligence, ensuring transparency and accuracy throughout the transaction.

As the local representative of 3B Solution PH Corp., Engela supports clients through property visits and documentation management, making the process efficient, clear, and well-managed from start to finish.

Core Expertise:
• Local market operations and client support in the Philippines
• Residential and commercial property leasing and sales
• Property and market research for investment decisions
• Marketing and brand visibility management
• Site inspections and due diligence coordination
• Documentation and transaction management

Professional Background:
• Director at 3B Solution PH Corp. (2023-present)
• Insurance consultant at Prudential Guarantee Assurance Inc. (2022-2023)
• Sales consultant at Hyundai Quezon Avenue (2021-2022)
• Bachelor\'s Degree in Business Administration, Marketing Management (2019)',
  shortBio = 'Director specializing in local market operations, property research, and client support across residential and commercial real estate in the Philippines, providing on-the-ground expertise for international investors.'
WHERE name LIKE '%Engela%'
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2nrMUifPqSFVuPK.root --database DnWsBVTJUtGDXWt9zvifVT --execute UPDATE team_members 
SET
